title: Golden Sherpa
description: Reckonsys collaborated with the client to develop a web-based SaaS solution that enabled elderly citizens and their families to search for communities online and schedule visits matching their needs

details.shortnote: Elderly people and their families find it very challenging to select a care provider that best suits their needs due to lack of information. Our client wanted to address this information gap and help eldercare communities and their consumers with stress-free search & selection through a common platform.
details.description: Reckonsys collaborated with the client to develop a web-based SaaS solution that enabled elderly citizens and their families to search for communities online and schedule visits matching their needs

content.title: ABOUT THE CLIENT
content.subtitle: A startup focused on connecting eldercare providers, communities, senior citizens and their families for easy and transparent interaction

points.value: Build a solution to connect communities with senior citizens
A technology partner with expertise to build an MVP to showcase the idea

Idea to solution design,
Technology selection,
UI/UX design,
Design & build MVP
Web-based marketplace for care-giving communities and consumers
Multiple search paramenters to find and select suitable caregivers
Persona-based evaluation of senior citizens
Intelligent scheduling and alert mechanisms
Secure online meeting and video chat
Increased visibility of eldercare providers and senior living communities
Stress free connect between senior citizens and communities
Improved quality of live for senior citizens & their families
Robust & scalable SaaS MVP for demonstration and usage
Secured funding after building the platform within 4 months
9 communities featured in 3 months of platform launch

title: Vndly
description: Our focus on applying the right web frameworks, best-fit design methodologies, and 3rd party components helps founders realize their ideas faster to an MVP while ensuring extensibility and longevity for expanding the scope of the product.

details.shortnote: Our client's vision was to build a next-generation vendor management SaaS platform designed for procurement executives, talent acquisition teams, suppliers and managed service providers (MSPs) to collaborate on the corporation's contingent workforce needs.
details.description: Reckonsys has been an integral part of the client's journey as a technology & development partner from building a talent acquisition solution as an MVP to a comprehensive contingent workforce management solution.

content.title: ABOUT THE CLIENT
content.subtitle: A start-up focused on building a platform to transform contractor hiring for enterprises.

points.value: Translate idea into an MVP
Build a demonstratable and scalable product
Technology partner with deep expertise

content.title: HIGHLIGHTS
content.subtitle: Idea to solution design, Technology selection, UI/UX design, Design & build MVP

points.label: Faster MVP Development
points.value: Intelligent translation of founder's ideas into a demonstrable MVP within 4 months

points.label: Long-term Collaboration
points.value: Exclusive development partner from ideation to MVP to multiple product versions

points.label: Scalable Platform
points.value: Extendable architecture that supported continuous changes to product scope.

points.label: Flexible Engagement
points.value: Responsive approach and collaborative culture meeting the evolving needs of the start-up

points.label: Speed and Cost Optimization
points.value: Leveraged 3rd party components for faster & economical development

points.label: Unified solution development
points.value: SaaS platform for talent acquisition, work-force lifecycle management, SOW management, and Reports & Analytics.

title: InappBi
description: Reckonsys was chosen to transform the product UX not only due its experience in helping product start-ups to realize their vision but also for its approach towards balancing useful and implementable design.

details.shortnote: Designing a UX that works for different user profiles from developers to users to power users is critical for an analytics product. It is more critical for the success of the product for our client who offers an affordable reports and analytics platform for enterprise applications. However, the strong focus and skills in technology ensured the right functionality where as the user interaction design was not up to the mark for our client.
details.description: Reckonsys was chosen to transform the product UX not only due its experience in helping product start-ups to realize their vision but also for its approach towards balancing useful and implementable design.

content.title: ABOUT THE CLIENT
content.subtitle: A next-gen analytics product start-up based out of the US

points.value: Product: InAppBI (Data Source Mapper, Query Builder, Data Visualization)
Offices: US, India
UX Design transformation for all functions of the analytics platform

content.title: PROBLEMS
content.subtitle: Current UX has a number of problems with navigation and look & feel

points.value: Lack of clarity while creating queries, reports, and dashboards
Longer navigation cycle time with more than required number of steps
Inconsistent and not so appealing visual design
Current UX gap analysis
User personas and storyboarding
User interaction design and Wireframe production
User Interface and Visual design

content.title: PRODUCT FUNCTIONS REDESIGNED
content.subtitle: New UX designed for 60+ screens that provide the following capabilities for the users

points.value: Connect to a range of data sources
Query and transform data using SQL and scripting
Create dashboards using an array of visualization libraries

content.title: BENEFITS
content.subtitle: The transformed UX has helped different personas such as business users, IT developers, and power users across various areas:

points.value: Intuitive and guided interface for better and faster visualization
Implementable UX design for few screens based development constraints
Optimized information density resulting in higher clarity for the users
Defined and consistent branding including appealing color schemes
